subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Pekka Rinne made 32 saves as he returned to his dominating form, Mike Fisher scored his first goal of these playoffs, and the Predators found their rhythm with a 2-0 win over the Coyotes.
snippet: Pekka Rinne made 32 saves as he returned to his dominating form, Mike Fisher scored his first goal of these playoffs, and the Predators found their rhythm with a 2-0 win over the Coyotes.
